Incorporate: - Bloom's progression: 20% REMEMBER/UNDERSTAND, 30% APPLY/ANALYZE, 30% EVALUATE, 20% CREATE. - Scaffolding: 25% per layer. - Voter priorities: Completeness (full NIST SP 800-61 Rev. 2 ยง3.2.4 & SP 800-86 details), pedagogy (active prompts), template examples. - Research: Evidence inventory lists 8 fields; ensures chain of custody/forensic soundness. Output ONLY a JSON array of flashcards matching flashcard_schema exactly. Vary types: 40% MCQ (with distractors), 30% Cloze, 30% Short Answer/Application. Ensure university-level rigor, active learning hooks, and no policy violations.
